sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: Returns the numeric TCP/IP address of the machine whose hostname is specified by the hostName parameter.
sections.text_content: Returns the numeric TCP/IP address of the machine whose hostname is specified by the hostName parameter.
sections.mdown_content: Returns** **the numeric TCP/IP address of the machine whose hostname is specified by the _hostName_ parameter.

sections.title: Details
sections.raw_content:
The Net module requires a TCP/IP stack to be installed and operating in order to function. It does not communicate using any other protocols

It is possible for Firewalls to interfere with the actions of the Net module, preventing connections from taking place.
sections.text_content:
The Net module requires a TCP/IP stack to be installed and operating in order to function. It does not communicate using any other protocols
It is possible for Firewalls to interfere with the actions of the Net module, preventing connections from taking place.
sections.mdown_content:
The **Net** module requires a TCP/IP stack to be installed and operating in order to function. It does not communicate using any other protocols
It is possible for Firewalls to interfere with the actions of the **Net** module, preventing connections from taking place.

sections.title: Example
code:
var hostName : string := "www.holtsoft.com"
        put "The machine address of ", hostName , " is ", 
            Net.HostAddressFromName (hostName)
sections.raw_content: The following program prints out the hostname of the current machine.
sections.text_content: The following program prints out the hostname of the current machine.
sections.mdown_content: The following program prints out the hostname of the current machine.

sections.title: Status
sections.raw_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the function by calling Net.HostAddressFromName, not by calling HostAddressFromName.
sections.text_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling Net.HostAddressFromName, not by calling HostAddressFromName.
sections.mdown_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling **Net.HostAddressFromName**, not by calling **HostAddressFromName**.
